name: Blockformer
description:
Blockformer is a simple platformer, all you do is try to stay alive, and continue on to the next area. Sadly, this game has been canceled. I kinda lost the code for it. I am working on redoing this game from scratch, with a slightly different style, so watch out for that!

Controls:

Left and Right Arrow Keys: Move Left and Right respectively.

Up Arrow Key: Jump

Spacebar: Jump
